code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./OrgaosSection.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReguladoresAdminSection=_ref=>{let{orgaos,updateOrgao,handleSave}=_ref;const[activeIndex,setActiveIndex]=useState(null);const toggleAccordion=index=>{setActiveIndex(activeIndex===index?null:index);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reguladores-admin-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"reguladores-admin-title",children:"Editar \xD3rg\xE3os Regulamentadores"}),orgaos.map((orgao,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reguladores-admin-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`reguladores-admin-header ${activeIndex===index?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>toggleAccordion(index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"reguladores-admin-orgao-title",children:["\xD3rg\xE3o Regulamentador ",index+1,": ",orgao.title]})}),activeIndex===index&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reguladores-admin-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:orgao.title,onChange:e=>updateOrgao(orgao.id,'title',e.target.value),className:"reguladores-admin-edit-input",placeholder:"T\xEDtulo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:orgao.description,onChange:e=>updateOrgao(orgao.id,'description',e.target.value),className:"reguladores-admin-edit-textarea",placeholder:"Descri\xE7\xE3o"})]})]},orgao.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"reguladores-admin-button-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleSave('orgaos'),className:"reguladores-admin-save-button",children:"Salvar"})})]});};export default ReguladoresAdminSection;
